verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had let him <S%H7971>go<s%> from <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> when he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> him being <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H246>chains<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H1546>carried<s%> away <S%H1546>captive<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which were <S%H1540>carried<s%> away <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

And the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H935>brought<s%> it, and <S%H6213>done<s%> according as he has <S%H1696>said:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> therefore <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H1961>come<s%> on you.

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H6605>loose<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H246>chains<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> it <S%H5869>seem<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to you to <S%H935>come<s%> with me into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H935>come;<s%> and I will <S%H7760>look<s%> well to you: but <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H5869>seem<s%> <S%H7489>ill<s%> to you to <S%H935>come<s%> with me into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H2308>forbear:<s%> <S%H7200>behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you: <S%H413>where<s%> it <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>convenient<s%> for you to <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> <S%H3212>go.<s%>

Now while he was not <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7725>gone<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> he said, <S%H7725>Go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> also to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has made <S%H6485>governor<s%> over the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H413>wherever<s%> <S%H3605><s%> it <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H3477>convenient<s%> to you to <S%H3212>go.<s%> So the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H737>victuals<s%> and a <S%H4864>reward,<s%> and let him <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah;<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> even they and their <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had made <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H6485>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and had <S%H6485>committed<s%> to him <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> and <S%H2945>children,<s%> and of the <S%H1803>poor<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> of them that were not <S%H1540>carried<s%> away <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>

Then they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%> even <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8576>Tanhumeth,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5778>Ephai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> and <S%H3153>Jezaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H4602>Maachathite,<s%> they and their <S%H582>men.<s%>

And <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them and to their <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and it shall be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you.

As for me, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%> to <S%H5975>serve<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to us: but you, <S%H622>gather<s%> you <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H7019>summer<s%> fruits, and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in your <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> that you have <S%H8610>taken.<s%>

<S%H1571>Likewise<s%> when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were in <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and among the <S%H5984>Ammonites,<s%> and in <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and that were in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>countries,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H5414>left<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and that he had <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan;<s%>

Even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they were <S%H5080>driven,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H7019>summer<s%> fruits <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3966>much.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were in the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Do you certainly <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H1185>Baalis<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> to <S%H5221>slay<s%> <S%H5315><s%> you? But <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%> them not.

Then <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%><S%H559>saying,<s%> Let me <S%H3212>go,<s%> I pray you, and I will <S%H5221>slay<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> it: <S%H4100>why<s%> should he <S%H5221>slay<s%> you, that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> which are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> to you should be <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6>perish?<s%>

But <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing:<s%> for you <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael.<s%>
